comment.author: 53291499@N02
comment._content: Pretty sure this isn't Stonewall Jackson.  Stonewall had a beard.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Thanks for your comment, R. Alex Raines.  During the Civil War, Stonewall Jackson did have a beard (a pretty large one too!).  However, this picture probably was taken before the War even started, most likely right before he left service to teach at the Virginia Military Institute in 1851.

Mary (U.S. National Archives)
